mapper.select: SELECT s.create_time ,u.uid ,u.user_name ,u.user_image FROM shop_follow_focus s LEFT JOIN user_info u ON u.uid = s.follow_id WHERE u.uid in ( SELECT follow_id FROM shop_follow_focus WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} ) ORDER BY s.create_time DESC LIMIT ${pageNum},${pageSize}

SELECT i.shop_id, i.shop_name, i.score, i.user_image, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shop_follow_focus where `status`=0 and shop_id=i.shop_id ) as follows FROM shop_follow_focus f INNER JOIN shop_info i ON f.shop_id = i.shop_id WHERE f.follow_id = #{userId} and f.`status` = 0 and i.`status` = 0 LIMIT #{page},#{limit}
SELECT count(*) FROM shop_follow_focus f INNER JOIN shop_info i ON f.shop_id = i.shop_id WHERE f.follow_id = #{userId} and f.`status` = 0 and i.`status` = 0
